description: Episode 4: The final round with our loved hair model Bianca Stone. This shoot should now be held high in regard since it's a rare chance to see Bianca's body full of fur! Ever since our January Live shoot where I shaved every hair off Bianca's tight body, she has kept her skin smooth and hairless. However, today you get to see Mistress Lorelei Lee take full advantage of this hairy animal and put her to her last test! Lorelei wants to know if with the proper electro-motivation, will Bianca rise to her expectations and successfully please her as Bianca's Mistress!
title: Last Chance for Hair!
